title: The Square Enix E3 2019 Press Conference - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.23.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://quip.com/games

Boost is only available at http://experian.com/kfgames.

Get 10% off your first order at http://brooklinen.com with promo code: GAMES

Upload VR's David Jagneaux joins Greg to talk about Square's E3 plan, Uplaod's VR Showcase, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:35 - Housekeeping
Cooking with Greggy is Back TODAY!
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -
00:07:29 - Square Enix E3 Press Conference
00:08:39 - “Do you think this will finally be the year we hear about the Avengers game?” - Lee
00:11:09 - “What are you guys hoping to see from Square Enix's conference at E3?” - Emmett Watkins Jr.
00:18:09 - Anthem Adds Requested Features - Patch 1.1.0
00:24:54 - More FortniteXAvengers
00:26:23 - World War Z Sells 1 Mil+
00:29:24 - Epic Games Store Exclusivity Means Money
00:37:24 - Out today
00:40:00 - “I bought the $100 edition of MK11…” - EJ
00:46:30 -  Quip
00:48:00 - Experian
00:49:55 - Brooklinen
Reader mail   -
00:51:03 - “How did you get into writing about VR, and a VR site?” - The Nano Biologist
00:56:02 - “I wanted to talk about something that was mentioned on yesterday’s show…” - Alec (from Minnesota)
00:57:10 - Required Reading: https://www.polygon.com/2019/4/23/18507750/fortnite-work-crunch-epic-games
00:59:46 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Fran & Whitta
